name: Squirrel Story
description:
A very short, casual platformer/puzzle adventure where you play as a squirrel trying to find the supplies they need before their date! 

This game was originally intended for Global Game Jam 2021, but due to unforeseen circumstances I decided it would be best to finish it up at a more leisurely pace over the last month.

The goal was to make something short, cute, and relaxing, and to experiment with making a RPG-like dialogue system that changes depending on what items you're holding and whether you've talked  to each NPC before. The extra time allowed for me to properly implement it the way I wanted to, and I'm pretty happy with the result. I hope you enjoy the game!

Character art and animations by @FestiveForLife and music by @Guff!
